# tf.keras.backend.softmax

``` python
tf.keras.backend.softmax(
    x,
    axis=-1
)
```



Defined in [`tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.12/tensorflow/python/keras/backend.py).

Softmax of a tensor.

#### Arguments:

* <b>`x`</b>: A tensor or variable.
* <b>`axis`</b>: The dimension softmax would be performed on.
        The default is -1 which indicates the last dimension.


#### Returns:

A tensor.
